page.title: 10Home Life.
page.content: {RELIGION}- I am a Muslim. I go to pray in a Mosque but some people pray at home. On entering the mosque I remove my shoes and wash my face and hands. We read a book, the Koran -{Tariq.} On Tuesdays, Mr. Sharples, Vicar and Chairman of Governors, teaches us RE. We learn about Jesus and how he came back from the dead -{Andrew.} I am a Roman Catholic and I go to mass in church on Sunday. The priest shares bread and wine with us and tells us to "Go in peace." -{Suzanne. {EMPLOYMENT}- Five days a week, my mum answers the phone and takes orders in a sweet factory -{Debbie.} My mum works five evenings a week as a cleaner at an Oldham bakery -{Sailesh. My dad is a pharmacist in Oldham. His firm makes medical supplies -{Paresh. {E GROUP - ST. JAMES' SCHOOL, ASHTON { }
